pages.text: Glowsquitos are a horrible pest that can be found in Glowstone Canyons.$(br2)This neutral creatures loves sucking the dust out of Glowstone, turning it to Dimstone and finally to Dullstone.$(br2)You can breed Glowsquitos giving them Shroomlight Juice.
Be careful if you attack one of these creatures, because after that, all of them will attack you.
